name: Aardbud
printed_effect:
You can Disenchant {omni} from your {insectoid} cards in
order to Special Ascend this Aardbud to
Aardvarum from your deck. When this Aardbud
receives 1 or more {earth} you can Search your deck
for a 1 Spirit {insectoid} Elestral and add it to your hand.
effect: You can Disenchant {omni} from your {insectoid} cards in order to Special Ascend this Aardbud to Aardvarum from your deck. When this Aardbud receives 1 or more {earth} you can Search your deck for a 1 Spirit {insectoid} Elestral and add it to your hand.
